meanings.definition: An instrument used to measure the refractive power of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The skiascope helped the doctor check how well my eyes can focus.
meanings.sent2: The optometrist used the skiascope to determine my prescription for glasses.
meanings.sent3: The skiascope looked like a tiny telescope for my eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her precision was like a skiascope, always able to see things clearly.
meanings.sent5: The skiascope revealed the hidden details of my vision.

meanings.definition: A device used to detect strabismus.
meanings.sent1: The skiascope showed that my eyes were not aligned properly.
meanings.sent2: During the eye exam, the doctor used a skiascope to check for strabismus.
meanings.sent3: The skiascope made my eyes play a game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her gaze was like a skiascope, always catching any deviation.
meanings.sent5: The skiascope uncovered the secret of my eye misalignment.

meanings.definition: A tool for assessing visual acuity.
meanings.sent1: With the skiascope, the optometrist tested how well I could see.
meanings.sent2: The skiascope helped determine the sharpness of my vision.
meanings.sent3: The skiascope made my eyes feel like detectives solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her insight was like a skiascope, revealing the smallest details.
meanings.sent5: The skiascope painted a clear picture of my visual clarity.
